medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Knee pain started about 15 years ago after a skiing incident that resulted in a torn meniscus. medical_history.social_history: The patient drinks wine in moderation (up to 2 glasses with dinner), is active with lots of exercise, and works in a health profession. Lives in the suburbs with her family.
